Title: Changes the allocation of the QEZE tax reduction credit to reflect business activity within the QEZE
Summary: Changes the allocation of the QEZE tax reduction credit to reflect business activity within the QEZE, rather than being based on an apportionment that does not reflect the economic activity taking place in New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to changing the allocation of the QEZE tax reduction credit to reflect business activity within the QEZE
